Text:
thanks wushdishmeen
not to many comments lately?


thx

jo
We love you, Wush! Thank you so much for all that you do. Don't know what I'd do without you!!

3/4 - HOWARD IS ON VACATION ALL THIS WEEK.  He is taping AGT in New Orleans and won't return until next week.

They are airing Mammary Lane but the specials will take longer to show up.  I use Howard's vacation time as my own break from this stuff.  But they'll still go up eventually.

Thanks.

Thanks, Wush. I can't believe it. He was on vacation the week before? But anyway, I might be saying it just for myself, but I wouldn't worry about those reruns. And the AGT shit -- I skip right thru it when he starts talking about it anyway. Thanks to you, it's pretty easy to do now. 

So take your time, man. You deserve it!

All right      wushdishmeen your posse must have heard me lol!
i will still d/l your offering i still like hearing different shows
thx
joe

Had to make an account just to say THANKS wushdishmeen, I used to listen everyday and had to move. When I did I had to change vehicles, the new one has no XM. I stumbled upon this just hoping to find an old clip. To be able to get it everyday now is just awesome!
Thanks again wushdishmeen!!!!!!
